short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to remove all favorite videos on TikTok.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TikTok All Favorite Videos Remover is a powerful Chrome extension designed to simplify the process of removing all favorite videos on TikTok. With just a click of a button, this extension enables you to effortlessly delete your entire collection of favorite videos on TikTok.

Are you looking to start fresh on TikTok or simply want to clear out your favorite videos? TikTok All Favorite Videos Remover provides a convenient solution. No more spending hours manually removing videos one by one. This extension automates the process, saving you valuable time and effort.

To use the extension, ensure that you are logged in to your TikTok account and on your profile page. Simply click the "Start" button provided by the extension, and it will initiate the automatic removal of your favorite videos. Each video will be removed at intervals of 3 seconds, ensuring a smooth and efficient process.
